sn4.18:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā magadhesu viharati pañcasālāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāme*.
sn4.18:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena pañcasālāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāme kumārikānaṃ pāhunakāni bhavanti.
sn4.18:4.3: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya pañcasālaṃ brāhmaṇagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn4.18:4.4: Tena kho pana samayena pañcasāleyyakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā mārena pāpimatā anvāviṭṭhā bhavanti:
sn4.18:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā yathādhotena pattena pañcasālaṃ brāhmaṇagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi tathādhotena pattena paṭikkami.
sn4.18:5.2: Atha kho māro pāpimā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn4.18:5.5: “Tathā nu tvaṃ, pāpima, akāsi yathāhaṃ piṇḍaṃ na labheyyan”ti.
sn4.18:5.6: “Tena hi, bhante, bhagavā dutiyampi pañcasālaṃ brāhmaṇagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisatu.
sn4.18:5.7: Tathāhaṃ karissāmi yathā bhagavā piṇḍaṃ lacchatī”ti.
sn4.18:8.1: Atha kho māro pāpimā “jānāti maṃ bhagavā, jānāti maṃ sugato”ti dukkhī dummano tatthevantaradhāyīti.
